dt: river over 1500 miles (2400 kilometers) long in central and western Asia flowing from the {d_link|Pamirs|Pamirs:g} into the Aral Sea
Reduced flow of the Amu Darya in the latter part of its course, mainly due to the siphoning off of water for irrigation, has been a contributing factor in the severe shrinkage of the Aral Sea.

shortdef: river over 1500 miles (2400 kilometers) long in central and western Asia flowing from the Pamirs into the Aral Sea
